alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 10:37PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Spalding, southeastern Fayette and east central Coweta Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1035 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Brooks, or 11 miles south of Fayetteville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Peachtree City, Senoia, Brooks, Vaughn, Starrs Mill and Digbey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
